title: Weird Name on an alt account

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Hey i got on an alt account i haven't been on in a while to play with a friend who is new to the game and when i got on my name was this crazy nonsense? has the account been hacked or should i be worried about it?

replies.body: This summoner name might show up if your name becomes inactive.  Technically you should have been prompted for a name change, but it doesn't look like it went through.  Let me know the summoner name and I'll fix this up for you, or you can hit is up individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Let me know if you have any questions!
